<h3 className="c-secondary">Testable Criteria 4.1.0: Discrimination Against Certain Target Groups</h3>
<b>Outcome: AI model should not create or reinforce bias against certain individuals or groups.</b>

      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>4.1.1</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Has the AI company established a strategy or a set of procedures to check that the data used in the training of the AI model, is representative of the population who make up the end-users of the AI model?</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Ensure training data is diverse and representative in order to avoid biasness against certain groups or individuals. </td>

<h3 className="c-secondary">Testable Criteria 4.2.0: Favouring Certain Brands/Products Over Others</h3>
<b>Outcome: AI model should not unfairly prioritize or favour certain brands/products (including own products) over others.</b>

<table>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <th style={{padding: "10px"}}>No.</th>

      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Is the AI model's decision-making process purely based on input data and does not unduly favor specific brands or products?</td>
      <td style={{paddingBottom: "15px"}}>Ensure that the AI model does not unduly favor specific brands or products and the decision-making process should be based on inputs only.</td>
      <td style={{padding: "10px 10px 15px 10px"}}>
